preface.title: Preface
preface.para: The Rackspace &CImS; offers retrieval, storage, and metadata assignment for Rackspace Cloud Server images through a simple Representational State Transfer (REST) web service interface.

section.title: Intended audience
section.para: This guide is intended to assist software developers who want to develop applications by using the Rackspace &CImS; REST application programming interface (API). It fully documents the &CImA;, which enables developersIt introduces developers to the &CImS;, so they can begin to interact with the storage components of the &CImS;.
